about_the_game:
Fast-paced. Roguelike. Hack & Slash. All-in-one package!

OVERKILL is where the supreme anger is released from your veins. Inspired by the fast-paced modern roguelikes and rhythmic games with roguelike elements, OVERKILL offers a setting where you constantly best monsters by evading their attacks via various dodge mechanics. You will smash your keyboard like you haven't before to OVERKILL your enemies with YOUR own skill, strategy, and anger.

Gameplay & Features

The features specified below will take place in the release version of the game.
  • Various monsters with unique dodge mechanics.
  • Trinkets and items to create combat strategies.
  • Character abilities to combine and shape the gameplay.
  • A dark, medieval, fantastic atmosphere.
  • Random events throughout procedurally generated runs.
  • Optional story elements and character interactions.
  • Different difficulty settings for the ultimate challenge and achievements.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain weapons, fights, blood, killing, cursing, crude language, revealing outfits, or veiled nudity in pixel art style in certain scenes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.04
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: An overclocked potato is more than enough.

short_description: OVERKILL is a fast-paced action roguelike game in a dark, fantastic medieval setting. You will fight against enraged monsters and enhance your characters' abilities for the ultimate massacre. Killing is not enough; you need to OVERKILL your enemies to show your utmost anger.
